main event: Radar operators tracked an unknown target on radar during a routine training mission on 3 Aug 51, which made several abrupt changes in course and speed before disappearing from view.
interesting points: The target was tracked for approximately 10 minutes,The object exhibited movements and performance characteristics inconsistent with conventional aircraft,Operators speculated the object could possibly be a remote-controlled model, but found this unlikely given its size and maneuverability,Experienced and reliable radar operators reported the sighting, suggesting it was phenomena out of the ordinary.
witness description: Radar operators part of a training mission
